title: Samarium Doped Cobalt Metal-Organic Framework as a Versatile Catalyst for the Conversion of Furfural and 2-Methyl Furan to High-Value Added Biofuel Precursor
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00671B, Paper
SAHIL SHARMA, Jyoti Rohilla, Sahil Thakur, Raghubir Singh, Varinder Kaur
The development of versatile catalysts for the conversion of biomass to value-added products is in great demand to cater the environmental issues and depleting fossil fuels for energy requirements. This...
